title: about
text:
Hey, my name is Zubin. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for minimalist design and creative interfaces.


I'm effective at finding performance-optimized solutions and building eye-catching front-end UI.


I'm a helpful collaborator, able to tackle complex logical problems, and resourceful when confronting new challenges.


In my spare time, I record and produce music for artists and friends.

title: sabotage
made:
Made with: ReactJS, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB/Mongoose, JavaScript ES6, HTML5, CSS3

Support packages: Pusher, Passport, Material-UI, Moment
text:
SABOTAGE is a React web game that penalizes users for wasting time on it.


All screen time is deducted from your score from the moment you log in.

Win points back by playing the solving the puzzle.

Spin the bonus wheel for a surprise.

Compare your scores with friends on the leaderboard in real-time.



> click here try out the app

title: keep-it-local
made:
Made with: NodeJS, Express, MySQL/Sequelize, Handlebars, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3

Support packages: Passport, Materialize, Moment, Geocoder
text:
KEEP IT LOCALÂ® is a tool to help people better connect with their local communities.

This app is for independent creatives to build scenes and find audiences.


Login/sign up to start browsing local, DIY events, message other users, or post your own events.

Results are limited to a 30 miles raidus of your current location.

To preserve the culture and trust of the network, you must have a referral code to join. Existing users can generate a new referral code every 3 days.

user: username

title: moodi
made:
Made with: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS

Support packages: Audio, REST APIs, AJAX
text:
MOODI is a minimalist image and sound-based relaxation application.


Click on any descriptive tag to go to a new sonic environment. Click a second tag to evoke an entirely different space.


Explore the possibilities and find easter eggs as you listen and relax.




> click here to try out the app
